text: Some interesting bits relevant to games: <http://www.polygon.com/2014/9/9/6127243/iphone-6-games-ea-disney-cd-projekt-red>

attachments.title: iPhone 6 games coming from EA, Disney, CD Projekt Red and more
attachments.text: Game publishers producing titles for the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus include Electronic Arts, Disney Interactive and CD Projekt Red, announced Apple's Phil Schiller during the phones' unveiling today...
attachments.fallback: Polygon: iPhone 6 games coming from EA, Disney, CD Projekt Red and more
